TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_rumazi, title = rumazi, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/rumazi} }

S.FORM: aicu a rumazi ljaki vecik nua linatinan (latin) a tja siaya uta mavan a vecik nua seruma kipavecik tua ljingav nua kai. a kemasicuayan a vecik nua linatinan izuazua mareka sipukeljang nua rumazi tua maretimaljimalji a takalan. pakata sipavecikan tua kai i tua namapapacikelan a mareka kuni (IPA), makeljanganga 26 a vecik a namapaljavak tua i ISO vecik nua linatinan. tjaljaliavan a sipakavecik aicu a rumazi tua zuma sipavecik. manu sema aicu a rumazi a tjaljaturuvu i kacauan a semanvecikan tua matjaliaw a kai i pasa iyurupu katua zuma a kaizuanan. == kasizuanan ==

aico a romazi ljaki vecik noa linatinan (latin) a tja siaya ota mavan a vecik noa seroma kipavecik toa ljingav noa kai. a kemasicoayan a vecik noa linatinan izoazoa mareka sipokeljang noa romazi toa maretimaljimalji a takalan. pakata sipavecikan toa kai i toa namapapacikelan a mareka koni (IPA), makeljanganga 26 a vecik a namapaljavak toa i ISO vecik noa linatinan. tjaljaliavan a sipakavecik aico a romazi toa zoma sipavecik. mano sema aico a romazi a tjaljatorovo i kacaoan a semanvecikan toa matjaliaw a kai i pasa iyoropo katoa zoma a kaizoanan. == kasizoanan ==
